name: Vader's Mask
Lore: 'Darth Vader''s armored mask and life-support system provide him with extraordinary physical protection in duels and battles, in addition to his Dark Jedi combat skill.',
Text: 'Deploy on [Vader] Vader.  During your battle phase, may cancel this Effect to allow Vader to make a regular move.  In order for opponent''s character to move away from here using landspeed, opponent must first lose 1 Force.  While defending a battle at opponent''s site, Vader is power +2 and immune to attrition. (Immune to Alter.)',
